listing.listing_description:
Brave the wilderness in style at this epic log cabin home overlooking the Clutha River in southern New Zealand. Gaze upon the snow-capped peaks from the master’s king bed. Take your morning coffee for a stroll across lush lawns down to the river’s edge, and enjoy while you plan out your day. Then, head to the ski slopes of Treble Cone or Cardrona Alpine Resort, about 50-km from home. 

Feel the warmth of River Ridge’s imposing timber frame, featuring logs shipped from British Columbia, assembled by local artisan craftsman. Wander the different lounge areas, great room, and bedrooms, and you’ll see how each piece of wood is truly unique. The kitchen adds a touch of modern brightness to the rustic-chic atmosphere, creating the perfect setting to try your hand at a local dish. 

After a long day of skiing, return home to warm yourself by the wood-burning fireplace. Before dinner in the 8-seat formal setting, unwind with an episode of a new series on Smart TV. After you’ve eaten, whip up a few cocktails at the kitchen’s bar and head to the games room for a pool match. In the warmer months, move the party outside to the 15-seat alfresco set and pick up some fresh to grill on the barbecue. 

Grab your hiking boots and camera, and drive 21-km to Mount Aspiring National Park to check out the trails and snap a few pics at the scenic lookout stops. When you’re ready to emerge from the wild, head to Wanaka Town to explore their boutique shops, quaint cafes, and local pubs and restaurants. If you find yourself longing for city life, Queenstown is about an hour’s drive from River Ridge. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Just a short leisurely stroll from Bali’s iconic Petitenget Beach, Villa Lilibel is a six-bedroom tropical getaway strategically placed close to all the very best of Bali. This villa is family-friendly and the vast property consists of lush gardens and a multitude of first class features. This luxury home provides up to twelve lucky visitors easy access to the cosmopolitan Seminyak district full of exotic options for shopping, dining and entertainment.

Only the finest amenities and creature comforts can be found at Villa Lilibel, starting off with a full staff of eager professionals comprised of a chef, butler, housekeeper and night watchman. The grounds feature a fifty-foot swimming pool tiled in Indian slate, not to mention gardens with varied flora and awe-inspiring stone statues. Indoors, guests will love the spa room from where massages can be ordered as well as the sixty-five inch television, Sonos sound system and Playstation 4 found in the media room.This home is tropical elegance defined, with polished wooden pillars and stone statues adorning rooms contrasted against brightly-colored furniture and fabric in a total open air concept. The spacious main dining room and lounge with soaring grass-thatched ceilings optimize communal and family moments. While there is a chef on staff, guests can help themselves to the modern gourmet kitchen featuring gorgeous design and nearly every conceivable appliance.

The six en-suite bedrooms are split evenly across the two floors of the villa, with a choice of bedding options that include either king size or two twin size beds. The beds are dressed in stylish linens and duvets and the suites are chic and contemporary. Ground floor suites access the patio, except the master suite which leads directly to the courtyard.

Villa Lilibel’s ideal location is simply extraordinary, as it is situated near countless attractions and varied sites that will appeal to everyone’s tastes and interests. For gourmands and epicureans, only a jaunt away is Seminyak Square, replete with delicious Indonesian and international cuisines. Culture aficionados will be glad to know that the Petitenget Temple and Tanah Lot are only a short drive away, providing dazzling insights into the island’s amazing spiritual customs and history.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Shaded decks make it easy to keep your cool at this recently renovated modern home within walking distance of Sunshine Beach village. Fold-away glass walls and railings offer seamless views, while inside, colorful surf-themed artwork punctuates crisp white open-concept rooms. Walk into town for a dip on the lifeguard-patrolled beach, then perch on the surf-club deck and spot dolphins over a drink.

Make the most of the area’s namesake sunshine in outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, lounging and dining areas, and a gas barbecue, all kept private by walls and bamboo plantings. There’s a smart TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi to keep friends and family busy in the evenings, as well as a telescope for a little old-school entertainment.

A fold-away glass wall connects the great room to the outdoor dining area at this vacation rental, while louvered windows let the cool sea breezes circulate around the open-concept space. White walls and wood floors are a neutral backdrop for colorful paintings and surf-themed accents in the sitting area, a dining area for 10, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

This luxury property has one master bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, as well as two bedrooms with queen beds that share a hall bathroom. A fourth queen bedroom shares a hall bathroom with a bedroom that has two twin beds.

An on-call manager and concierge are on hand should you need anything during your holiday. But it’s easy to walk from the villa into downtown Sunshine Beach, where there’s a beach with lifeguards along with one-of-a-kind boutiques, cafés tapping into the Australian obsession with coffee, and restaurants where you can relive your honeymoon over a great meal. It’s also less than a 5-minute drive to the equally trendy center of Noosa Heads.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy European-inspired elegance in a sun-splashed locale at the spectacular Chateau Du Soleil. Set on private grounds just outside Knockrow, this vacation rental is a short drive from Byron Bay, Lennox Head, Ballina and miles of incredible beaches. Its custom-built interiors and four bedrooms can welcome up to eight friends or family members in an ambience of thoughtful luxury.

The grounds include a swimming pool, tennis court, sitting and dining areas, and a gas barbecue, so there’s no shortage of spaces to relax with a book or take in the countryside views. Inside, the amenities range from a smart TV and Wi-Fi to a wine cooler and a selection of family-friendly games.

Like the French estates that inspired its name, Chateau Du Soleil is distinguished by impeccable craftsmanship and luxe finishes. Its stone walls open to bright, airy rooms accented by stately fireplaces and a sweeping staircase. There are formal living and dining rooms as well as an open-concept great room with a living area, dining area and a fully equipped kitchen.

The villa has two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms that share access to a hall bathroom: one with a king bed and one with a queen bed. All four bedrooms have air conditioning, and several have features such as ocean views, fireplaces or balcony access.

Though the chateau is so secluded that a holiday feels like a honeymoon from the everyday, it’s not hard to reach the area’s attractions. Chateau Du Soleil is a 10-minute drive from Ballina and its airport, a 10-minute drive from Lennox Head and a 15-minute drive from Byron Bay. Drive to the nearby North Creek, Broken Head, Byron Main and Byron Bay beaches and decide which is your favorite, or look out from the easternmost point in Australia at Cape Byron Lighthouse.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Drift across the pool, tropical greenery and blue skies overhead, as you lose yourself in the tranquility of this airy Balinese villa. Watch the sunset over the rice fields from the rooftop patio, take a yoga class in the gazebo, and catch up on some reading in the garden. Treetop tours and elephant safaris are easily bookable, or you could rent a motorbike and do some exploring of your own.

Practicing progressive minimalism, Villa Saba believes a clutter-free environment will result in a clutter-free mind. From the terrazzo floors inside to the wood decking on the terrace, you’ll flow as freely as the breeze, and it’s all lit with warm natural light. Lush vegetation, water features, and Balinese art set the tone for relaxing days and exciting nights. Let your inner mixologist shine.

Start your morning off with a quick meditation session on the planks of the water garden. Sip your morning Espresso on the rooftop patio, greeting the sun as it rises over neighboring farmer’s fields. At night, light up the fire pit, turn up the sound system and grill up something fresh from a local market on Saba’s barbeque. And, make sure to pick the perfect pairing from the wine fridge.

In the peak of the afternoon heat, head for Waterbom Bali Waterslides and let the kids run wild while you sip a cold beer at the poolside bar. Then, dance in the sand at Ku De Ta Beach Club while the sun sets over the ocean.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy views of the horizon from this Manly waterfront apartment, located Ground floor. Slate accents blend with polished hardwood floors and vibrant décor, flowing through the open-concept space. Panoramic windows let sunlight in from all angles. Merely steps from Manly’s town centre, your pick of seaside restaurants, surf shops, and a waterfront table to savour a cool, crisp shandy are waiting. 

A small gate allows pathway access to the beach; just a couple of hundred meters away, dig your toes into the sand as you stroll along the shoreline or dive in for a refreshing saltwater swim. An azure-tiled swimming pool seemingly stretches out to sea from the stone-lined backyard. Breakfast can be served in the shade at the deck's teak table. 

Some of Sydney’s most sought-after attractions are practically on your doorstep; reach the Central Business District in 30 minutes by boat or even quicker if you take a fast ferry. Rent a car, or take advantage of the city’s public transport, to check out Taronga Zoo, the Harbour Bridge, Opera House, and the Royal Botanic Gardens. The Bondi to Bronte coastal walk will give you dramatic views of sweeping ocean vistas—just make sure you pack your swimsuit to cool down in the rolling waves at either location after the hike.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The Glass House is an apartment in the Paddington neighborhood of downtown Sydney. With design by Nina Maya Interiors in collaboration with local suppliers, this contemporary masterwork offers an experience of this Australian metropolis while placing you within minutes of its most iconic attractions. The apartment features an outdoor lounge and spacious interior living areas, appointed with features for cooking and entertainment. Three bedroom suites (two with king beds and one with a queen) accommodate families and groups of friends, up to six in size.

The architecture of the Glass House features open-concept layouts on both floors and abundant natural light. A wide vanishing wall opens between the interior living areas and the courtyard lounge, creating an expansive indoor/outdoor space for gatherings or relaxation. Sip Australian wine in the lounge, or kindle a fire on cool evenings and relax with your favorite TV shows. Prepare delicious meals at the barbecue grill or in the fully equipped kitchen, and dine together around the table for six.

The kitchen is like a work of fine art unto itself, with a stove and island bar made of green marble. The home is equipped with security, electronic media, and smart home features, including Apple TV and Alexa voice control, and features air conditioning and underfloor heating. Gallery-worthy artwork is displayed in every room.

A floating staircase leads to the upper-level bedrooms. All guest suites feature designer headboards, upholstered walls, appointed robes, and ensuite bathrooms.

From the villa’s location at 31 Boundary St., in the neighborhood of Paddington, you're about three or four kilometers from Sydney Opera House and the Royal Botanic Gardens, and within easy reach of several famous beaches, including Tamarama, Bondi, and Coogee. Proximity to Sydney Airport makes the Glass House an ideal vacation rental for destination wedding guests or easy weekend escapes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find a lush and lovely Bali home in Villa Inti. Set just outside central Canggu, close to Pererenan Beach, this vacation rental is a quiet, private place to relax with friends and family. Inviting outdoor spaces, beautifully designed interiors and five bedrooms make it a wonderful retreat for up to ten guests.

Savor the gorgeous weather from outdoor living areas with a pool, living and dining areas, plenty of loungers and a barbecue. After the sun sets, look to the media room, smart TV, sound system and Wi-Fi for entertainment. Your holiday at Villa Inti also includes the services of a villa manager, housekeeper and guard.

From the classic balé, or gazebo, to the vaulted ceiling that soars over the great room, Villa Inti exudes oft-imitated Balinese style. Its laid-back appeal is evident in the thatched roof, open-sided living and dining rooms, and the richly detailed wood furnishings that fill the space. There’s also a fully equipped kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances.

Each of the villa’s five bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom. Several of the bedrooms open to the pool area or a shared terrace, and, for your comfort on the warmest tropical nights, all five have air conditioning and ceiling fans.

Villa Inti is just a short drive from hip downtown Canggu, where you can dine on fresh, local fare, take a yoga or surf class, or browse crafts in the market. The closest beach is Pererenan, known for its break, but it’s not much farther to other popular beaches from Batu Bolong and Batubelig to Petitenget. For high-end boutiques and a range of restaurants, make the drive into chic downtown Seminyak; for ever-lively nightlife, there’s the resort area of Kuta. Guests who prefer teeing off to hanging ten will appreciate the nearby Nirwana Bali golf course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover just how remarkable eco-friendly luxury can be at Mahu Whenua. This South Island vacation rental, whose name translates to “healing the land,” is set on 55,000 hectares of former sheep station in the shadow of the mountains that make up Mount Aspiring National Park. Now, this expanse of land is devoted to plant-regeneration and native-bird-breeding programs—and to being a private escape for you.

Your holiday at Mahu Whenua includes the services of a chef, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as a pre-dinner drink and canapés each day. If you’re visiting in the summer, soak in the sunshine from the swimming pool or al-fresco lounge area; in cooler weather, soak in the outdoor hot tub, cozy up by the outdoor fireplace or head inside to enjoy the Apple TV, surround-sound system, pool table and Wi-Fi.

Amid the spectacular hills and valleys, forests and rivers is, happily, a cozy main house. Here, you can reconnect with friends and family under the vaulted ceiling of the living area, beneath the skylights of the dining room, or across the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

There are two bedrooms in the estate’s main house, two in two guest cottages and one bunk room. All four bedrooms have king beds and en-suite bathrooms; the bunk room has one twin bunk bed, one twin-over-double bunk bed and a shared hall bathroom. The guest cottages have fully equipped kitchenettes and their own terraces, making them ideal for couples wanting honeymoon-style privacy.

This extraordinary retreat is only a 20-minute drive from Wanaka, the gateway to Mount Aspiring National Park. It’s also a 90-minute drive or a 10-minute helicopter flight from Queenstown. In the summer, you can immerse yourself in the scenery at local attractions such as the Wanaka Lavender Farm; in the winter, skiing is close at hand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend a relaxed family holiday in one of the world’s finest resort communities at Kauna’oa 7B at Mauna Kea Resort. This Big Island vacation rental is part of the Kauna’oa private community, a 52-acre haven on Kauna’oa Bay with a country club, its own practice golf course and convenient beach access. It’s the perfect destination for groups of up to eight.

This luxury townhouse is tucked into its own lush garden with a serene waterfall feature, heated pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue. Guests are also welcome at the shared infinity pool, hot tub and fitness center at the Kauna’oa Country Club. After a day on the fairways or at the beach, pour a glass from the villa’s wine fridge and settle in by the cable TV and Wi-Fi.

Enjoy seamless indoor-outdoor living thanks to slide-away pocket doors that separate the villa’s great room from the lanai. Feel the warm breezes and watch the ocean in the distance from the open-concept living area, dining table for eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances.

Kauna’oa 7B has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom with honeymoon-suite-inspired details such as a jetted tub and al-fresco shower. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two double beds, respectively. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

The villa is only a 5-minute walk from Hapuna Beach and a 10- to 12-minute walk from the Mauna Kea Beach and Westin Hapuna Beach hotels, where membership privileges are available to give you access to the beach loungers, towel service, watersports equipment and more. And with four beaches and golf courses within a 10-mile drive, it’s easy to experience some of the best Hawaii has to offer.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #: T-183-492-1984-01

STVR-19-355866

listing.listing_description:
Find stunning green design in verdant surroundings overlooking the Pacific at The Beach House at the Bluffs. Set on a private cul-de-sac in the exclusive Bluffs area of the Kohala coast, this Big Island vacation rental boasts incredible ocean views—and nearly 11,000 square feet of beautifully designed indoor and outdoor living space from which to enjoy them.

Get your fill of Hawaiian sunshine in outdoor living areas featuring an infinity pool, hot tub and loungers—or nap in the shade of a lanai with lounging and dining furniture and a barbecue. You can even take the surfboards and paddleboards down to the beach. After sunset, pour a glass or two from the wine fridge and settle in by the TV in the media room, or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.

The villa’s award-winning design seamlessly integrates the outdoor and indoor living areas for a luxury experience, island-style. Slide open the glass walls and let the breezes waft over the L-shaped living and dining rooms, or plan the day’s adventures around the breakfast table in the fully equipped kitchen.

The residence has two bedrooms with king beds and two with two queen beds each; all four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas and air conditioning, and open to a lanai. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms feature airy details such as vaulted ceilings and slide-away walls.

Whether you’re traveling with friends, family or on a honeymoon-style getaway, there’s plenty to see and do close by. Guests of The Beach House at the Bluffs are welcome to use amenities like the pools, tennis courts and golf course at the Mauna Kea Resort and the Westin Hapuna resort. Even better, the villa’s Waimea location puts you less than a 15-minute walk from the nearest beach and two golf courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stretch out in a sunbed beneath the shade of the poolside pergola while gazing out over Jimbaran Bay at this Balinese hilltop home. Immerse yourself in lush greenery, mature trees, and fresh sea breeze. Relax as the full-staff caters you your every whim. Then, make your way 7 minutes to the sandy shores of Kedonganan Beach, where you'll find crystal waters and a delicious seafood restaurant.

A bright, modern take on Balinese architecture, Villa Adenium shows off the warm wood tones, open-air layout, and integration of water features, for which the style is known. The interior uses cream tones, contemporary furnishings, and high-end electronics to merge the present with the luxuries of simpler times. Notable upgrades include the games room, home gym, media room.

Start your mornings with an espresso on the master's balcony, looking out over the sailboats in the bay below. After, join the group at the kitchen's breakfast bar for brunch. Before lunch, head out to the fish market on Kedonganan Beach and pick up something fresh to grill on the barbecue. Later on, challenge a friend to a game of pool, ping pong, or videogames before an alfresco dinner.

It's finally time to try surfing. Kuta Beach is a perfect spot for beginners to take lessons. The soft sandy bottom creates some of the best waves on the planet. If you'd like to practice before taking it to the ocean, visit Armada Flow House's wave simulator, it's fun for the whole family. Then, spend the night sipping cocktails and listening to live music on the beach at Bali Beach Shack.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Kokos Beach House 3 is part of a set of elegant homes, each with their own private outdoor entertaining and pool area. They are located just a 5 minute walk to pristine Belongil Beach and a 10 minute walk to Byron town centre and main beach.

These homes boast beautiful modern European furnishings, luxury appliances, and each features its very own private pool. Guests will enjoy the large open plan kitchen, dining, lounge, and outdoor entertaining area. There are 4 bedrooms inside; two ensuite and two with a shared bathroom.

The Kokos Beach Houses provide a luxurious escape in self contained holiday houses.

listing.listing_description:
This superb luxury home is situated within Champion Ridge, a gated golf community at Mauna Lani Resort on Hawaii's Big Island. With sweeping views of the golf course, Pacific Ocean, and Kohala Mountains, the villa offers an enchanting sanctuary within minutes of some of the finest fairways, spa facilities, and beaches in Hawaii. The house balances vintage island elegance with high-end amenities for relaxation and dining, including a private swimming pool, hot tub, and gourmet kitchen. Three bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms, plus a sofa bed in the den, accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eight in size.

The elegant pool extends the entire width of the house, hugging the shapely terrace and inviting you into its refreshing waters. The hot tub is secluded to the side of the house, ideal for soothing soaks under the sun or stars. The cool and spacious lanai features a high-end barbecue grill serving a lovely dining table, while the comfortable lounge enjoys panoramic views of the sunset.

The villa's living room features high, vaulted ceilings and a wide threshold opening to the lanai, allowing the home to breathe the sea-kissed air. The open-concept space includes a comfortable TV lounge and a superb dining table for ten. The kitchen will inspire the contemporary cook, with high-grade appliances, generous prep space, and wide doors to the alfresco dining area. A separate media room welcomes afternoon downtime or late-night movies, while the home office provides an inspiring retreat for students or business travelers.

The bedrooms offer dreamy havens for private relaxation and rest, furnished in a timeless Hawaiian style. All three suites open to the lanai, and each features an ensuite bathroom. Throughout the home, vaulted ceilings and beautiful wood accents cast a soothing, natural ambiance amid the lush, sun-kissed landscape of the resort.

Mauna Lani Beach Club is just over a mile from the villa, featuring a swimming pool, hot tub, clubhouse, and watersports equipment. The spa and fitness facilities at Mauna Lani Resort are about five minutes away, and you're less than a mile from world-class golf at Francis H. I'i Brown South Course. The 23.5-acre Champion Ridge community features private gardens and Hawaii's only 18-hole putting course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
_ The Mauna Lani Bay Hotel & Bungalows are closed for renovations until November 2019. Please contact a Villa Specialist for more details. _

A true tropical paradise set amid secluded grounds on the Mauna Lani Resort, Hale Lalama is one of the finest Big Island vacation rentals available. With room for up to 12 guests, it’s perfect for large groups or families to enjoy a relaxing holiday in a beautiful environment.

You’ll love the magnificent pool area, with its private resort-style saltwater pool, eight-person spa, water slide, diving board and waterfall. Sit back and relax on the palm-fringed terrace’s comfortable sun loungers – later in the day, take in the amazing Hawaiian sunsets. There’s a barbecue and alfresco dining facilities, and the property is surrounded by lush lawns and gardens.

The upscale decor and luxurious features continue throughout the spacious interior. There’s great attention to detail, from the attractive furnishings and colorful artwork to the superbly equipped modern kitchen. Recreational facilities include a media room, and music and video libraries.

Sleep in air-conditioned comfort in each of the six well-appointed bedrooms, all located on the ground floor. Every bedroom is provided with its own superb ensuite bathroom equipped with both a shower and a large jetted bath.

The shops, restaurants and activities of Mauna Lani Resort are only minutes away, as are the resorts’ world-class golf courses. Whale-watching is a major attraction along the coast during the winter months, or ask your concierge about local surfing, kayaking and other water sports.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Get into the aloha spirit by way of Bali at Pakui Street Home. This three-bedroom Big Island vacation rental was designed with influences from around the Pacific Rim in mind—and even has views over the golf course to the Pacific itself. Its location close to the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort and Kona town give you easy access to beaches, shopping, dining and more.

The home opens to a lush private backyard with a solar-heated pool, spa, hammock and gas barbecue, as well as a spacious lanai with sitting and dining areas. For your entertainment, there’s Apple TV, Wi-Fi access and a stereo system; for your convenience, there are also laundry facilities.

Pakui Street Home pairs classic Hawaiian style with Balinese-influenced art and architecture to stunning effect. Two slide-away glass walls connect the lanai to the open-concept great room, where a vaulted ceiling lends a breezy feel to the living area, a dining area and a well-equipped kitchen. An office nook just off the kitchen is a quiet spot to catch up on emails to friends and family at home.

The three bedrooms at this luxury property can accommodate groups of up to six—or can be reserved for one couple on a Hawaiian honeymoon. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with an alfresco shower, and one bedroom with two twin-over-double bunk beds. All three bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.

Villa guests can opt in to resort privileges at the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort, giving you access to the sports, tennis and kids clubs, golf course, beach and pool services, and more during your holiday. Take the provided golf carts to the resort or, if you’d like to see more of the island, make the 15-minute drive to Waikoloa Beach Resort or the 20-minute drive to the town of Kona.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID#: 013-121-7408-01

listing.listing_description:
Escape to a luxury hideaway in the Bali jungle at Villa Ka. This private paradise is tucked into the landscape around Badung and offers a peaceful—and fully staffed—haven for up to ten guests. Reserve its five bedrooms to reconnect with friends and family in a resort-worthy setting that’s close to beaches and sights but removed from the bustle of the island’s popular south coast.

Your holiday at Villa Ka includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, security guard and more. Revel in the balmy weather in the swimming pool, read and nap on the loungers, heat up the barbecue for an al-fresco dinner or serve refreshments from the indoor wet bar and wine cooler. While the villa feels removed from the everyday, it has a media room, sound system, TV and Wi-Fi.

The living areas at this unique vacation rental are laid out across several pavilions dotting the garden-like grounds. Thatched roofs, open sides and traditional carved furniture add to the charms of the main living and dining rooms. While chef service is included as part of your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with amenities like a coffee press and water dispenser.

Each bedroom is a honeymoon-worthy retreat within the property boasting a queen bed and en-suite bathroom. While the bedrooms themselves have air conditioning and ceiling fans for your comfort, the bathrooms are al-fresco, letting you listen to the birdsong and luxuriate in the warm breezes while you take a bath or shower.

In spite of the villa’s secluded feel, it’s a short drive from dining, shopping and entertainment in downtown Seminyak and North Kuta. For a beach day, catch the surf at Batu Belig Beach or watch the sunset from the sands of Kayu Putih Beach or Double Six Beach while sipping a cocktail.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The rolling hills of Australia get a classic-Hawaiian twist at this breezy villa in Fernleigh. Tap into the vintage vibes and let this mini-resort-like estate take you to new levels of relaxation. Spend star-lit evenings laid back in the hot tub. Sip wine in the terrace lounge while the kids toast marshmallows around the fire pit. In the morning, start your day with a walk along Broken Head Beach.

 

Arrive in style on Luana Estate's helipad. After you've touched down, take a minute to explore Luana's collection of Hawaiian artifacts and vintage photography. Navigate your way around warm wood interiors, wall-length openings to the terrace, and dozens of scenic viewpoints. The open-plan kitchen's island and bench make a perfect social setting, even when preparing meals.

 

 Keep up with up your fitness routine on Launa's private tennis court, in the lap pool, or challenge a friend to a game of ping pong. Then, get your group's best griller to fire up the barbecue for lunch; there are gas and charcoal options. After lunch, grab a local craft brew and see if you can find some rugby on the Smart TV or keep up with any work in the office space.

 

After a morning on the beach, shift your focus inland and head out on a bushwalk through the trails of Broken Head Nature Reserve, or, get the lay of the land while you work out your swing on Teven Valley Golf Course. For dinner and nightlife, Ballina and Byron Bay are both within a twenty-minute drive. If you really want to cut loose, head for the theme parks on the Gold Coast.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located within the prestigious gated community of the Mauna Lani Resort on the Big Island, villa Lau’lea is the perfect home base for an incredible Hawaiian getaway. Overlooking the Francis H. L’i Brown Golf Course, with the ocean just beyond, you’ll have quick and easy access to the course and Mauna Lani Beach. With four king ensuite bedrooms and spacious indoor/outdoor lounge areas, Lau’lea is ideal for a golf trip with friends, family beach vacation, or sunny corporate retreat.

Lau’lea’s property is decorated with lush greenery, mature palms, and rugged stonework, showing off the beautiful environment of the Big Island. Moving inside, you’ll appreciate elegant natural elements like marble floors, rich wood tones, and a breezy, open-air layout. When the multiple doors to the terrace are open, Lau’lea floods with warm tropical sunlight and fresh ocean breeze. In the living room, you’ll find high-end designer furnishings and electronics. The fully equipped kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity with its restaurant caliber stainless steel appliances. And, the formal and alfresco dining areas are sure to provide beautiful settings for any occasion.

Outside, you’ll love spending afternoons cooling off in the infinity swimming pool, and nights relaxing in the hot tub. After a morning on the golf course, head back home for a quick barbeque lunch before heading out to explore the many amenities of the Mauna Lani Resort.

When it’s time to hit the beach, Mauna Lani’s private beach club is just a nine-minute walk from Lau’lea, and there are several more gorgeous beaches in the area, many within six or seven miles. On the resort, you’ll find kayaking, snorkeling, scuba diving, and sailing tours available from Mauna Lani Sea Adventures. And, the nearby city of Waimea is perfect for shopping, dining, and nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Always wanted to try surfing? Now’s the time. You’ll find lessons, equipment rental, and Surfer’s Paradise Beach just steps from Penthouse 69. Rather keep dry? Shoot a round at Emerald Lake Golf Club, map out a hike through Springbrook National Park, or take the kids to SeaWorld. Before you head out, get the lay of the land over an alfresco breakfast on the terrace, gazing out over 260-degree views of Australia’s Gold Coast.

Open your eyes each morning to an incredible ocean view. Next, sip Nespresso from the privacy of one of 69’s 2 scenic balconies. Head back inside to enjoy breakfast in the crisp, white interior, decorated with designer furnishings and contemporary accents. And, stretch out on the sofa while you contemplate plans for another exciting day in Australia. If you’ve decided to dine in, 69’s minimalistic kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity, and the formal and alfresco table settings give off a stylish vibe for every occasion.

Subtracting travel time from the equation, The Soul Building makes it easy to keep up with daily routines in their state of the art gym. After a workout, cool down in the shared indoor/outdoor swimming pools or relax in the hot tub, sauna, and steam room. The kid's pool is a great place for the little ones to make friends. And, the barbeques, gardens, and alfresco dining areas of Soul are available for special events.

Directly opposite of Surfer’s Paradise Beach, Penthouse 69 resides in the bustling lifestyle district, minutes from restaurants, nightlife, and theme parks. Spend your day's tanning, kite surfing, or golfing, before hitting the town for an evening of beachfront bar hopping. Feeling more laid-back? The Coast is lined with incredible lookouts, hiking trails, and national parks to explore, as well as many other pristine beach areas.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the heart of Seminyak, one of Bali’s most lively and cosmopolitan centers, is a massive urban luxury villa like no other, dubbed Eshara Estate. Tucked away in an inconspicuous and quiet lane, Eshara Estate provides eight large bedrooms in three separate villas for hosting larger groups of friends or families. This modern villa has been treated with traditional Balinese patterns and colors so as to remain wholly ensconced in the natural charms of this magical island.

Each of Eshara Estate’s three villas have private gardens and swimming pools, separated by an ingenious system of retracting garden walls. Guests of the estate will also benefit from the dedicated service of a full staff including a butler, chef, housekeeper and three night watchmen. Guests can indulge in the estate’s total home entertainment systems or Wi-Fi, or take the party outside on the terrace complete with loungers. Enjoy fantastic meals at the alfresco dining area!

Owing to the ‘three-in-one’ nature of the estate, there are individual great rooms found in each villa, complete with clear living, dining and kitchen areas. The furnishings are incredibly fun and unique including stylish cowhide seating. Crystal chandeliers illuminate the great rooms, and the walls feature brightly colored works of art. The home is replete with stone-carved statues of Balinese goddesses as well as a variety of Indonesian antiques and artifacts.

Each villa offers master and junior suites, and each suite has a full en-suite bathrooms for maximum privacy. The bedrooms have been adorned with fantastic spiritual icons, wonderfully alluring local patterns and plenty of amenities to make guests feel right at home. Master suites additionally boast sensuous alfresco bathrooms, not to mention a convenient and direct entrance to the central pool.

Not only is there so much to see and do in Seminyak, but it is also close to many other sites and attractions on this relatively small island. It’s only a half hour drive to the Elephant Safari Park in Taro, where one can gaze upon these deeply revered creatures in their natural habitat. Even closer is the cultural capital of Ubud, full of museums, traditional dances and exotic sights. Get the vacation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sprawl out over 2 floors of glamorous, beachside living at this oceanfront villa. It’s designed with eye-catching, angular architecture that exudes modern sophistication. Soaring windows look out onto uninterrupted vistas, while a grassy stretch leads directly to your gated beach access. Located in Queensland’s Sunshine Coast, pristine shorelines, cafés, and world-famous surf breaks are nearby.

The vast, open-concept layout is complemented by high ceilings and a multitude of skylights. Glass railings on the upper terrace and expansive sliding doors framing the ground level allow unobstructed views from all angles. A clean, minimal colour scheme flows throughout with cement, lacquer, and natural wooden accents punctuating each room. The kitchen’s massive scullery is the perfect spot to sip a flat white while watching for whales out at sea. Outside, tropical foliage lines the courtyard. A resort-sized pool features an exhilarating, winding slide that the kids will love. Set the alfresco table and savour a fresh seafood feast under the stars. 

Noosa's famous Hastings Street is mere moments away. Once you’ve commandeered a table at a local joint, order one of Australia’s most flavourful wines and enjoy the mid-afternoon sun. A walking track through Noosa National Park twists its way along the sugar-sanded coast. On a day trip, visit Fraser Island—known as The Great Sandy National Park—where you can discover lush forests, sand dunes, and over 100 freshwater lakes. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Surf the waves of Byron Bay and return on foot to poolside relaxation and barbecue meals on the veranda. Modeled after Mediterranean island beach houses, this family-friendly villa near Clarkes Beach balances contemporary comforts with a bright, rustic simplicity in harmony with the landscape of Australia’s easternmost coast. The famed coffee shops and eateries of Byron Bay Town are within easy walking distance, and several of the region’s finest beaches are within 5 minutes of your door. 

Broad sunbeds and parasols surround the swimming pool on the ground level, with an ample grass yard for games or casual cocktail parties. The upper floor features the main living areas, with a spacious interior and gourmet kitchen opening to a wide, covered balcony with views of the bay. The bedrooms are spread out on both levels, including a small bunk room upstairs and a large bunk room downstairs.  The downstairs level also features a media room with ping-pong table opening to the yard and pool.

The prime location in Byron Bay places you within minutes of some of the finest dining, nightlife, and natural splendors in New South Wales. Walk about 3 minutes into town for coffee or dinner, enjoy a surfing lesson at Clarkes Beach, and look for humpback whales traversing the shimmering expanse. Drive about 6 minutes to Byron Bay Lighthouse and set off for a day hike on Cape Byron Walking Track. Experience the region’s pristine, otherworldly beauty at Arakwal National Park. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Try out life as a Sydneysider at Wylde St Penthouse. This beautiful Potts Point vacation rental boasts postcard-worthy views fit for visitors from a private residence set in the midst of shopping, dining and other city amenities. Its two bedrooms are just the right size for a sightseeing trip with family and friends or a honeymoon spent exploring the area.

Your holiday at the penthouse begins with a welcome hamper full of gourmet goodies and includes concierge service and Netflix access. You’ll want to spend sunny days taking in spectacular views of the skyline and Harbour Bridge from a terrace with a sitting area, dining area and barbecue. On cooler evenings, retreat to the media room and enjoy high-tech amenities from a smart TV and Sonos sound system to Wi-Fi.

Inside, this luxury property is bright and modern, thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows and sleek furnishings. Large-scale artwork makes a statement in the living room, while sculptural chairs are their own form of art in the dining room. Between the living and dining rooms is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a cocktail bar area.

The penthouse has two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, including an incredible master suite with its own lounge area and kitchenette. For larger parties, there’s also a double sofa bed in the study, which has access to a hall bathroom.

Wylde Street is less than a 10-minute drive from must-sees like the Harbour Bridge and Sydney Opera House, and is just a short walk from some of the best shopping and dining the city has to offer. On the warmest days, pop down to nearby Hayes Street Beach, a sandy cove that’s one of the area’s best-kept secrets, where you can go kayaking or grab a coffee from a local cafe.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
